meanings.definition: Having an abnormal refractive error in the eye.
meanings.sent1: The ametropic eye struggles to focus properly.
meanings.sent2: She visited the eye doctor to address her ametropic vision.
meanings.sent3: The ametropic eye played tricks on him, making objects appear blurry.
meanings.sent4: Her view of the world through ametropic eyes was like looking through a distorted lens.
meanings.sent5: The ametropic condition made everything seem like a fuzzy puzzle to solve.

meanings.definition: A person with an abnormal refractive error in the eye.
meanings.sent1: The optometrist diagnosed him as an ametropic.
meanings.sent2: She met another ametropic at the vision clinic.
meanings.sent3: The ametropic in the mirror winked back at him mischievously.
meanings.sent4: Among the ametropics, she stood out like a unique gem.
meanings.sent5: The group of ametropics bonded over their shared eye condition.
